html:
{{doc.company}}

{{doc.company_address}}
(602) 519-0450
company@example.com
INVOICE TO:

{{doc.customer_name}}

{{doc.customer_address}}

INVOICE

Date of Invoice: {{doc.posting_date}}
Due Date: {{doc.due_date}}
{%- for row in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
# DESCRIPTION UNIT PRICE QUANTITY TOTAL
{{ row.idx }}

{{ row.item_name }}

{% if row.item_code != row.item_name -%}
Item Code: {{ row.item_code}}{%- endif %}		 {{row.get_formatted("rate", doc) }} {{ row.qty }} {{row.get_formatted("amount", doc) }}
SUBTOTAL {{doc.total}}
TAX 16% {{doc.total_taxes_and_charges}}
GRAND TOTAL {{doc.grand_total}}
Thank you for your business !
NOTICE:
A finance charge of 1.5% will be made on unpaid balances after 30 days.
Invoice was created on a computer and is valid without the signature and seal.
name: sales_invoice_gsg
